Entry.name: A
Entry.value: Expiration date and a carrier's factor may be changed at any time

Entry.name: B
Entry.value: Expiration date may be changed at any time

Entry.name: C
Entry.value: Expiration date and factor may not be changed before the trigger date, but may be changed after the trigger date

Entry.name: D
Entry.value: Expiration date may be changed at any time; carrier may change its factor only prior to the trigger date

Entry.name: E
Entry.value: Expiration date may be changed at any time; carrier may change its factor only after the trigger date

Entry.name: F
Entry.value: Expiration date may not be changed before the trigger date; it may be changed after the trigger date

Entry.name: G
Entry.value: Expiration date may be changed at any time; carrier may change its factor only on number of days advance notice as indicated in the transaction

Entry.name: H
Entry.value: Expiration date may be changed only after the number of days advance notice indicated in the transaction

Entry.name: I
Entry.value: Expiration date may be changed only after 30 days advance notice

Entry.name: L
Entry.value: Date can be changed at any time; the through-rate can be changed at any time by the proposer

Entry.name: N
Entry.value: Expiration Date and Factor may be Changed Only After the Number of Days Advance Notice Indicated in the Transaction
